short_description: Dual-band Wi-Fi with 5 GHz speeds up to 867 Mbps and 2.4 GHz speeds up to 300 Mbps, delivering 1200 Mbps of total bandwidth¹. Dual-band routers do not support 6 GHz. Performance varies by conditions, distance to devices, and obstacles such as walls.

Easy network management at your fingertips with the TP-Link Tether app. Keep your WiFi performing at its best by keeping the firmware updated through the App. All Wi-Fi routers require a separate modem.

Expand your WiFi Coverage with EasyMesh Compatibility - Easily create a Mesh network by pairing your router with any EasyMesh-compatible wifi router/range extender, providing seamless whole-home coverage.

short_description: 𝐍𝐞𝐱𝐭-𝐆𝐞𝐧 𝐁𝐄𝟓𝟎𝟎𝟎 𝐃𝐮𝐚𝐥-𝐁𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐖𝐢-𝐅𝐢 𝟕 - Designed with the latest Wi-Fi 7 technology, featuring Multi-Link Operation (MLO), Multi-RUs, and 4K-QAM. With speeds up to 4324 Mbps on the 5GHz band and 688 Mbps on the 2.4 GHz band with 5 streams, the Archer BE260 delivers seamless 4K/8K streaming, AR/VR gaming, and incredibly fast downloads/uploads for optimized performance on latest WiFi 7 laptops and devices, like the iPhone 16 Pro, and Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra. ⌂◇

𝐔𝐥𝐭𝐫𝐚-𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝟐.𝟓 𝐆𝐛𝐩𝐬 𝐖𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞 – Features 1x 2.5 Gbps WAN port, 1x 2.5 Gbps LAN port and 3x 1 Gbps LAN ports, integrate with a multi-gig modem for fast gig+ internet and offer high-speed data transmissions.

𝐖𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 - Get up to 2,400 sq. ft max coverage for up to 80 devices at a time. 5 optimally positioned antennas and Beamforming technology focus Wi-Fi signals toward hard-to-cover areas for stronger coverage.

𝐎𝐮𝐫 𝐂𝐲𝐛𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐢𝐭𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 - TP-Link is a signatory of the U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency’s (CISA) Secure-by-Design pledge. This device is designed, built, and maintained, with advanced security as a core requirement.
𝐃𝐨𝐞𝐬 𝐍𝐨𝐭 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝟔 𝐆𝐇𝐳 𝐁𝐚𝐧𝐝 – Please note that this dual-band WiFi 7 router does not support the 6 GHz band. It operates on the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands only.

𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐂𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲𝐦𝐞𝐬𝐡 - Easily extend your WiFi coverage by adding EasyMesh-compatible routers, range extenders and wireless powerline adapters, creating a seamless, whole-home network without dead zones as well as preventing drops and lag when moving between signals. △
𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐒𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐩 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐔𝐬𝐞 - Set up your Archer BE260 in minutes and manage network settings with the Tether app (Android or iOS) or web interface.

𝐓𝐏-𝐋𝐢𝐧𝐤 𝐇𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐒𝐡𝐢𝐞𝐥𝐝 - Provides comprehensive home network protection, robust parental controls, and real-time IoT security when you are at home or on the go. A safer internet experience enhances your smart living and adds armor to your network.*

𝐕𝐏𝐍 𝐂𝐥𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐞𝐝 - Enables home devices to access remote VPN servers without installing VPN software on each device. Supports simultaneous VPN and regular internet connections for enhanced security and flexibility.

𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 - Use an Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant-enabled device to control Archer BE260 with just your voice. Backward compatible with all WiFi generations and works with any internet service provider (a modem is required for most internet service providers).
product_description: Experience the Power of Wi-Fi 7 Step into the next generation of home Wi-Fi with the Archer BE260 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 7 Router. It is built with cutting-edge Wi-Fi 7 technology, featuring Multi-Link Operation (MLO), Multi-RUs, and 4K-QAM, ensuring exceptional speed and reliability for both wired and wireless internet connections. Whether you’re streaming Netflix, Prime Video, or Disney+, or browsing at ultra-fast speeds on your Wi-Fi 7 devices, like the iPhone 16 Pro, the Google Pixel 9, or PS5 Pro, this router delivers top-tier performance. The dimensions for this product are 10.6 x 6 x 1.9 inches, and it weighs 1.32 lbs. Included with the purchase is the Archer BE260 Wi-Fi 7 Router, a quick installation guide, a power adapter, and an RJ45 Ethernet cable. Powered by 12V 2.5A, the Wi-Fi 7 router supports an array of advanced features, including beamforming, MU-MIMO, OFDMA, Airtime Fairness, DFS, AP mode, access control, IPTV, IPv4/IPv6, guest networks, LED control, port forwarding, SPI Firewall, and IP MAC Binding. It is compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant and includes cloud services for automatic firmware updates. The Tether app offers intuitive network management, allowing you to monitor network status, block unauthorized users, and access TP-Link HomeShield. HomeShield has advanced security features that protect your family and network’s privacy and data. Features include a real-time home network scanner that detects potential threats and security issues, parental controls where you can manage time online and block inappropriate content, and quality of service (QoS) where you can assign your favorite devices to have the fastest connections for top performance. It also allows you to set up a separate Wi-Fi SSID for IoT devices and enable advanced WPA3 encryption, reducing the risk of unauthorized access to sensitive data on your main network.◇⌂
